minions.name: Ninja Master
minions.description: You may destroy a minion on this base

minions.name: Tiger Assassin
minions.description: You may destroy a minion of power 3 or less on this base

minions.name: Shinobi
minions.description: Special: Before a base scores, you may play this minion there. You can only use one Shinobi's ability per base

minions.name: Ninja Acolyte
minions.description: Special: On your turn, if you have not yet played a minion, you may return this minion to your hand and play an extra minion on this base

actions.name: Infiltrate
actions.description: Play on a base. Destroy an action that has been played here. Ongoing: You may ignore this base's ability until the start of your next turn

actions.name: Seeing Stars
actions.description: Destroy a minion of power 3 or less

actions.name: Assassination
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: Destroy this minion at the end of the turn

actions.name: Disguise
actions.description: Choose one or two of your minions on one base. Play an equal number of extra minions there, and return the chosen minions to your hand

actions.name: Hidden Ninja
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, play a minion there

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: Play on a minion. Destroy any number of actions on it. Ongoing: This minion has -4 power. (Minions have minimum power of 0.)

actions.name: Smoke Bomb
actions.description: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' actions. Destroy this card at the start of your turn

actions.name: Way of Deception
actions.description: Move one of your minions to another base
